title: What is the sequence of 6018508860? - Quora

response.answer_text: 6018508860=6×10^9+1×10^7+8×10^6+5×10^5+8×10^3+8×10^2+6×10 From this one can further simply to get a nice series from which you have your sequence.
One possible answer is that it is the number of a mobile phone in Jackson, Mississippi, USA. (601) 850–8860.
